summary.Title: Service employee
summary.Presentation: For our client Eurowrap A / S, we are looking for a service employee for primary forklift driving with a row truck and sometimes warehouse work for their production of gift wrap. The position is fo

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For our client Eurowrap A / S, we are looking for a service employee for primary forklift driving with a row truck and sometimes warehouse work for their production of gift wrap. The position is for permanent employment.

The work itself consists of producing rolls of gift wrap as well as other gift-wrapping items. You will accept orders for items from the warehouse workers and then deliver the products to the rolling mill, which produces the rolls with gift wrap. You must also be willing to help around the production in case of busyness. Training will take place and will last 1-2 weeks.

We expect

- That you have a forklift truck certificate and experience with driving a forklift truck

- That you have a good physique

- That you can work with hearing protection for a whole day

- That you can maintain an overview, but have an eye for details too

- That you can work independently

 

We offer

- Salary by agreement

- Working hours Monday to Friday at 6: 30-15: 00

- Overtime may occur

- Start-up as soon as possible

 

Do you want to know more?

Eurowrap A / S is an international company that produces gift wrapping articles wholesale. Their customers are both Danish and international customers. The company is in Ringsted.

 

If you are interested, please apply via the ad. If you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to contact us at the following telephone number 31 60 22 88 on weekdays between 8-16.

 

Who is Marsøe?

We offer temporary and recruitment solutions for companies within Construction, Warehouse & Industry and IT, Administration & Sales. We are quality-conscious and take great pride in providing the best service to everyone we meet on our way. We are driven by a desire for success, and we are passionate about providing the best service for both clients and candidates.

We believe that success and results are created through good relationships with both customers, employees, and the employer, regardless of which industry you are in.

Marsøe ApS is physically located in Hvidovre, but our services extend throughout Zealand.
